responses.response: Our Delhi outlet offers a wide variety of barbeque options including vegetarian and non-vegetarian starters, main courses, and desserts. You can find the detailed menu on our website or ask for specifics.
We have tables available for lunch and dinner slots at the Delhi outlet. Please provide the date, time, and number of guests to check availability.
To book a table at our Delhi outlet, please provide your name, phone number, number of guests, preferred date and time.
To cancel your booking at the Delhi outlet, please share your booking ID or the phone number used during booking.
Our Bangalore outlet serves a rich selection of barbeque dishes including seafood, chicken, paneer, and a lavish dessert spread. For full menu details, visit our official site.
The Bangalore outlet is open for lunch and dinner bookings. Let us know your preferred date, time, and number of guests to check slots.
For booking at the Bangalore outlet, we need your name, contact number, number of guests, and the date and time you wish to book.
Cancellations for the Bangalore outlet can be done by sharing your booking ID or registered phone number.
